languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит какое-то время, а затем холодно произносит:{/n} "Но, Эклендиль... Как Крударах оказался в Просторе, так близко к кораблям мон-кай и охотничьим угодьям Темных?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит какое-то время, а затем холодно произносит:{/n} "Но, Эклендиль... Как Крударах отказался в Просторе, так близко к кораблям мон-кай и охотничьим угодьям Темных?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт молчит какое-то время, а затем холодно произносит:{/n} "Но, Эклендиль... Как Крударах оказался в Просторе, так близко к кораблям мон-кай и охотничьим угодьям Темных?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet guarda silencio durante un rato y luego pregunta con frialdad.{/n} «Pero Eklendyl... ¿cómo acabó Crudarach en la Extensión, tan cerca de las naves mon-keigh y de los terrenos de caza de los Oscuros?».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet guarda silencio durante un rato y luego pregunta con frialdad.{/n} «Pero Eklendyl... ¿cómo acabó Crudarach en la Extensión, tan cerca de las naves mon-keigh y de los terrenos de caza de los Oscuros?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはしばらく沈黙したあと、冷ややかに言った。{/n}「しかし、エクレンディル…クルダラは、モン＝ケイの船や暗黒の者たちの狩場にこれほど近いエクスパンスにどうやってたどり着いたのだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはしばらく沈黙したあと、冷ややかに言った。{/n}「しかし、エクレンディル…クルダラは、モン＝ケイの船や暗黒の者たちの狩場にこれほど近いエクスパンスにどうやってたどり着いたのだ？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了一会儿，随后冷冷地问道。{/n}“可埃克伦迪……克鲁达拉赫怎么会来到科罗努斯扩区？怎么会离猴子的舰队与黑暗子嗣的狩猎场这么近？”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了一会儿，随后冷冷地问道。{/n}“可埃克伦迪……克鲁达拉赫怎么会来到科罗努斯扩区？怎么会离猴子的舰队与黑暗子嗣的狩猎场这么近？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet reste silencieuse quelques instants, puis déclare froidement,{/n} « Mais, Eklendyl... Comment Crudarach a-t-il bien pu finir dans les Étendues, aussi près des vaisseaux {mf|du|de la} mon-keigh et du terrain de chasse des Eldars noirs ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet reste silencieuse quelques instants, puis déclare froidement,{/n} « Mais, Eklendyl... Comment Crudarach a-t-il bien pu finir dans les Étendues, aussi près des vaisseaux {mf|du|de la} mon-keigh et du terrain de chasse des Eldars noirs ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schweigt einen Augenblick und sagt dann kalt: {/n} "Aber Eklendyl ... Wie kam Crudarach letztendlich in die Ausdehnung, so nah an die Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiffe heran und in die Jagdgebiete der Dunklen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schweigt einen Augenblick und sagt dann kalt: {/n} "Aber Eklendyl ... Wie kam Crudarach letztendlich in die Ausdehnung, so nah an die Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiffe heran und in die Jagdgebiete der Dunklen?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, bir süre sükûnetini koruyor. Ardından soğuk bir tonla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Eklendyl... Ne oldu da Crudarach'ın yolu, mon-keigh gemilerinin ve Karalar'ın av bölgelerinin bu kadar yakınındaki Enginlik'e düştü?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while and then says coldly,{/n} "But Eklendyl... How did Crudarach end up in the Expanse, this close to mon-keigh ships and the Dark Ones' hunting grounds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, bir süre sükûnetini koruyor. Ardından soğuk bir tonda konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ama Eklendyl... Ne oldu da Crudarach'ın yolu, mon-keigh gemilerinin ve Karalar'ın av bölgelerinin bu kadar yakınındaki Enginlik'e düştü?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
